home.heroTitle: Advancing health care for the greater good
home.heroSubtitle: The best of three companies and their members are now united around infinite opportunity.

whatWeDo.heroSubtitle: We connect members with the knowledge, solutions and expertise to amplify their performance and deliver better care.

relatedLinksBlocks.linkExcerpt: See how our members learn, improve and build together
Hear what our members are doing at the forefront of health care
Read the latest insights from our experts
Keep up to date on our latest news
See what’s happening at Vizient. Explore this area to find the latest news, recent and archived press releases, and hot topics facing the health care industry.

Our vision is to offer a unique supplier experience through increased supply chain efficiency, visibility and credibility. Our suppliers play a valuable role in helping our members meet the unique needs of their patients and communities. Find out how your organization can become a supplier.

Our dedication to member success is why we’re here. We equip members through a variety of affiliation options that can help organizations drive down costs and deliver better care. Become a member for access to more leading practices, an expanded network and better knowledge sharing.
Join our committed health care team and be part of the next chapter in the Vizient success story.
Discover how our members are driving new business models and groundbreaking approaches
Learn about our members’ bold initiatives to advance care for their patients and communities
Read the latest insights from our experts
